DataElement.preferredName: Clinical Performed Observation Outcome Data Sentinel CDM Tobacco Smoking History Code
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Relating to the examination and treatment of patients dependent on direct observation.  The term may also refer to the institution (clinic) providing this activity.:Executed and carried through to completion.:Watching something and taking note of what happens.:The result of an action._A collection or single item of factual information, derived from measurement or research, from which conclusions may be drawn._Tobacco status as of the visit date. Unknown values should be left blank. The "Not asked" value should be used only when it is a valid response from your system (e.g. this is a valid value for EPIC). The "Conflicting" value should be used when you receive tobacco information from multiple sources that disagree.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Relating to the examination and treatment of patients dependent on direct observation.  The term may also refer to the institution (clinic) providing this activity.:Executed and carried through to completion.:Watching something and taking note of what happens.:The result of an action._A collection or single item of factual information, derived from measurement or research, from which conclusions may be drawn.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Relating to the examination and treatment of patients dependent on direct observation.  The term may also refer to the institution (clinic) providing this activity.:Executed and carried through to completion.:Watching something and taking note of what happens.:The result of an action.

Concepts.definition: Relating to the examination and treatment of patients dependent on direct observation.  The term may also refer to the institution (clinic) providing this activity.
Executed and carried through to completion.
Watching something and taking note of what happens.

Property.preferredDefinition: A collection or single item of factual information, derived from measurement or research, from which conclusions may be drawn.

Concepts.definition: A collection or single item of factual information, derived from measurement or research, from which conclusions may be drawn.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: DEC released per model owner approval. mc 2/2/11

ValueDomain.preferredName: Sentinel CDM Tobacco Smoking History Code
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Tobacco status as of the visit date. Unknown values should be left blank. The "Not asked" value should be used only when it is a valid response from your system (e.g. this is a valid value for EPIC). The "Conflicting" value should be used when you receive tobacco information from multiple sources that disagree.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The quality of being unlike or dissimilar.

Concepts.definition: The quality of being unlike or dissimilar.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Exposure to potentially harmful chemical, physical or biological agents via the environment.

Concepts.definition: Exposure to potentially harmful chemical, physical, or biological agents via the environment.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An adult who has smoked 100 cigarettes in his or her lifetime and who currently smokes cigarettes. Includes daily smokers and non-daily smokers (also known as occasional smokers).

Concepts.definition: An adult who has smoked 100 cigarettes in his or her lifetime and who currently smokes cigarettes. Includes daily smokers and non-daily smokers (also known as occasional smokers).

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A person who was not smoking at the time of the interview and has smoked less than 100 cigarettes in their life.

Concepts.definition: A person who has never smoked at the time of the interview or has smoked less than 100 cigarettes in their life.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A person who was not smoking at the time of the interview but has smoked at least 100 cigarettes in their life.

Concepts.definition: A person who has quit smoking at the time of the interview but has smoked at least 100 cigarettes in their life.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Exposure to tobacco smoke products among individuals who do not smoke. This can result from sharing space with a smoker or from placental transfer from mother to fetus.

Concepts.definition: Exposure to tobacco smoke products among individuals who do not smoke. This can result from sharing space with a smoker or from placental transfer from mother to fetus.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: This information has not been sought (e.g., patient was not asked)

Concepts.definition: No inquiry was made to gather this information.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Observations and activities relating to behavior, such as smoking and ETOH use.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A system of numbered categories for representation of data.

Concepts.definition: A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

ValueDomain.origin: Sentinel CDM:The Sentinel Common Data Model
